mapper.insert: INSERT INTO classroom ( name, capacity, building, type, status ) VALUES ( #{name}, #{capacity}, #{building}, #{type}, #{status} )
mapper.update: UPDATE classroom SET name = #{name}, capacity = #{capacity}, building = #{building}, type = #{type}, status = #{status} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT id, name, capacity, building, type, status FROM classroom ORDER BY id ASC
SELECT status, COUNT(*) as count FROM classroom GROUP BY status
SELECT DATE_FORMAT(create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') as date, COUNT(DISTINCT classroom_id) as used_count FROM course_schedule WHERE create_time >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 7 DAY) GROUP BY date

SELECT ROUND(COUNT(DISTINCT cs.classroom_id) * 100.0 / COUNT(DISTINCT c.id), 2) as rate FROM classroom c LEFT JOIN course_schedule cs ON c.id = cs.classroom_id WHERE cs.create_time >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 30 DAY)
SELECT c.name, COUNT(cs.id) * 100.0 / (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM time_slot) as usage_rate FROM classroom c LEFT JOIN course_schedule cs ON c.id = cs.classroom_id GROUP BY c.id, c.name
SELECT c.name, AVG(cs.student_count * 100.0 / c.capacity) as utilization_rate FROM classroom c LEFT JOIN course_schedule cs ON c.id = cs.classroom_id GROUP BY c.id, c.name

SELECT cl.id as classroomId, cl.name as classroomName, COUNT(c.id) as totalCourses, COUNT(DISTINCT c.course_time) as usedTimeSlots, (COUNT(DISTINCT c.course_time) * 100.0 / (SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT course_time) FROM course)) as usageRate FROM classroom cl LEFT JOIN course c ON cl.id = c.classroom_id GROUP BY cl.id, cl.name

SELECT cl.id as classroomId, cl.name as classroomName, cl.capacity as totalCapacity, AVG(c.current_students) as avgStudents, MAX(c.current_students) as maxStudents, (AVG(c.current_students) * 100.0 / cl.capacity) as utilizationRate FROM classroom cl LEFT JOIN course c ON cl.id = c.classroom_id GROUP BY cl.id, cl.name, cl.capacity
